#summary BioScope description

== BioScope Description ==

BioScope is an application developed for use with SOLiD sequencing platforms developed by Applied Biosystems. This software can be run on a cluster infrastructure or cloud computing configuration. More on this software can be found [https://products.appliedbiosystems.com/ab/en/US/adirect/ab?cmd=catNavigate2&catID=606802&tab=DetailInfo here].
